---
title: "Step 3: Discovering Emergent Themes"
---


```{r}
#| include: false

library(readxl)
library(DT)
library(tidyverse)

studentA <- read_xlsx(
  here::here("data", "code_book.xlsx"), 
  sheet = "studentA"
  ) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("theme"),
               names_to = "theme", 
               values_to = "theme_note"
              ) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("note"), 
               names_to = "note", 
               values_to = "notes"
               ) %>% 
  select(-theme, -note) %>% 
  drop_na(theme_note, notes)

studentB <- read_xlsx(
  here::here("data", "code_book.xlsx"), 
  sheet = "studentB"
  )
```
